name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes:
**Note 1:**  When both Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and extension detail are available, record the code with extension detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage. FIGO Stage IIIC is assigned based on tumor extension and/or regional lymph node involvement.  Code regional (code 200) based on a physician's statement of FIGO Stage IIIC only if it is known that the stage value is assigned because of tumor extension. 

**Note 2:**  FIGO no longer includes a Stage 0 (Tis) for this schema.

**Note 3:**  Liver capsule metastases are coded in SEER Primary Tumor; liver parenchymal metastases are coded in SEER Mets.

**Note 4:**  Both extension to and discontinuous metastasis to any of the following pelvic organs are considered FIGO Stage II and coded in primary tumor as regional (code 200): adnexa, NOS; bladder, bladder serosa; broad ligament (mesovarium); cul de sac; contralateral fallopian tube; omentum; parametrium; pelvic peritoneum; pelvic wall; rectum; sigmoid colon; sigmoid mesentery; small intestine; ureter; uterus; uterine serosa. 

**Note 5:**  Both extension to and discontinuous metastasis to any of the following abdominal organs are considered FIGO Stage III and coded in SEER Mets: abdominal mesentery; diaphragm; gallbladder; infracolic omentum; kidneys; large intestine except rectum and sigmoid colon; liver (peritoneal surface); pancreas; pericolic gutter; peritoneum, NOS;  spleen; stomach; ureters.

**Note 6:**  Code unknown (code 999) if inadequate staging biopsies and/or a lack of peritoneal cytology make it inaccurate to classify the patient with confidence as early stage (Stage T3a/IIIA has not been excluded by adequate staging biopsies).
footnotes:
^ Since “cancer cells in ascites or in peritoneal washings”  was not specifically categorized in either the Historic Stage or in the 1977 Summary Staging Guide, previous cases may have been coded to either regional or distant

\*** Considered distant in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
